column4: ok lol, so i go to mozilla.org, download 3.5 and it downloads this tar.bz2 type file, so i click on it and it opens up windows showing buntch of file in directory. =/ how do i install this?
There is a Readme file or an Install file containing all informations.
I looked at read me....it just points to a release notes web page...not how to install.
I think you can just dubble-click on the firefox file and it will lsunch it. You may want to copy the directory to /opt and make a symlink for the firefox launch file in /usr/bin
